) return NUMBER;

process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_instance_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_id IN NUMBER

,equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

);

END da_modem;

body.name: DA_MODEM
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_MODEM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.00.173154000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_instance_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem.add(fx), parms=' || modem_instance_id || '|' || equipment_product_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem a
(
a.modem_id
,a.modem_instance_id
,a.equipment_product_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_modem_id.NEXTVAL
,add.modem_instance_id
,add.equipment_product_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.modem_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_instance_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem.add, parms=' || modem_instance_id || '|' || equipment_product_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem a
(
a.modem_id
,a.modem_instance_id
,a.equipment_product_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_modem_id.NEXTVAL
,add.modem_instance_id
,add.equipment_product_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_id IN NUMBER
,modem_instance_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem.add, parms=' || modem_id || '|' || modem_instance_id || '|' || equipment_product_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem a
(
a.modem_id
,a.modem_instance_id
,a.equipment_product_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.modem_id
,add.modem_instance_id
,add.equipment_product_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem.del, parms=' || modem_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_modem a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.modem_id = del.modem_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem.del');

END del;

END da_modem;
